meanings.sent1: The doctors decided to coadmit the patients for better care.
meanings.sent2: The hospital policy allows family members to coadmit in emergency situations.
meanings.sent3: The two friends joked that they should coadmit to a spa for a relaxing weekend.

meanings.definition: To be admitted jointly or together.
meanings.sent1: The siblings always coadmit to the same college to stay close.
meanings.sent2: The twins prefer to coadmit in activities to support each other.
meanings.sent3: The puppies seemed to coadmit to causing mischief whenever they were together.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the painting coadmit harmoniously, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients in the recipe coadmit perfectly, resulting in a delicious dish.
